verses.verse: And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of the LORD:<WH3068> and the LORD<WH3068> delivered<WH5414> them into the hand<WH3027> of Midian<WH4080> seven<WH7651> years.<WH8141>

And the hand<WH3027> of Midian<WH4080> prevailed<WH5810> against<WH5921> Israel:<WH3478> and because<WH4480> <WH6440> of the Midianites<WH4080> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> made<WH6213> them<WH853> the dens<WH4492> which<WH834> are in the mountains,<WH2022> and caves,<WH4631> and strongholds.<WH4679>

And so it was,<WH1961> when<WH518> Israel<WH3478> had sown,<WH2232> that the Midianites<WH4080> came up,<WH5927> and the Amalekites,<WH6003> and the children<WH1121> of the east,<WH6924> even they came up<WH5927> against<WH5921> them;

And they encamped<WH2583> against<WH5921> them, and destroyed<WH7843> <WH853> the increase<WH2981> of the earth,<WH776> till<WH5704> thou come<WH935> unto Gaza,<WH5804> and left<WH7604> no<WH3808> sustenance<WH4241> for Israel,<WH3478> neither sheep,<WH7716> nor ox,<WH7794> nor ass.<WH2543>

For <WH3588> they<WH1992> came up<WH5927> with their cattle<WH4735> and their tents,<WH168> and they came<WH935> as<WH1992> grasshoppers<WH697> for multitude;<WH7230> for both they<WH1992> and their camels<WH1581> were without<WH369> number:<WH4557> and they entered<WH935> into the land<WH776> to destroy<WH7843> it.
And Israel<WH3478> was greatly<WH3966> impoverished<WH1809> because<WH4480> <WH6440> of the Midianites;<WH4080> and the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> cried<WH2199> unto<WH413> the LORD.<WH3068>
And it came to pass,<WH1961> when<WH3588> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> cried<WH2199> unto<WH413> the LORD<WH3068> because of<WH5921> <WH182> the Midianites,<WH4080>

That the LORD<WH3068> sent<WH7971> a prophet<WH5030> unto<WH413> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> which said<WH559> unto them, Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> I<WH595> brought you up<WH5927> <WH853> from Egypt,<WH4480> <WH4714> and brought you forth<WH3318> <WH853> out of the house<WH4480> <WH1004> of bondage;<WH5650>

And I delivered<WH5337> you out of the hand<WH4480> <WH3027> of the Egyptians,<WH4714> and out of the hand<WH4480> <WH3027> of all<WH3605> that oppressed<WH3905> you, and drove them out<WH1644> <WH853> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> you, and gave<WH5414> you<WH853> their land;<WH776>

And I said<WH559> unto you, I<WH589> am the LORD<WH3068> your God;<WH430> fear<WH3372> not<WH3808> <WH853> the gods<WH430> of the Amorites,<WH567> in whose<WH834> land<WH776> ye<WH859> dwell:<WH3427> but ye have not<WH3808> obeyed<WH8085> my voice.<WH6963>

And there came<WH935> an angel<WH4397> of the LORD,<WH3068> and sat<WH3427> under<WH8478> an oak<WH424> which<WH834> was in Ophrah,<WH6084> that<WH834> pertained unto Joash<WH3101> the Abi-ezrite:<WH33> and his son<WH1121> Gideon<WH1439> threshed<WH2251> wheat<WH2406> by the winepress,<WH1660> to hide<WH5127> it from<WH4480> <WH6440> the Midianites.<WH4080>
And the angel<WH4397> of the LORD<WH3068> appeared<WH7200> unto<WH413> him, and said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, The LORD<WH3068> is with<WH5973> thee, thou mighty man<WH1368> of valor.<WH2428>

And Gideon<WH1439> said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, Oh<WH994> my Lord,<WH113> if the LORD<WH3068> be<WH3426> with<WH5973> us, why<WH4100> then is all<WH3605> this<WH2063> befallen<WH4672> us? and where<WH346> be all<WH3605> his miracles<WH6381> which<WH834> our fathers<WH1> told<WH5608> us of, saying,<WH559> Did not<WH3808> the LORD<WH3068> bring us up<WH5927> from Egypt?<WH4480> <WH4714> but now<WH6258> the LORD<WH3068> hath forsaken<WH5203> us, and delivered<WH5414> us into the hands<WH3709> of the Midianites.<WH4080>

And the LORD<WH3068> looked<WH6437> upon<WH413> him, and said,<WH559> Go in<WH1980> this<WH2088> thy might,<WH3581> and thou shalt save<WH3467> <WH853> Israel<WH3478> from the hand<WH4480> <WH3709> of the Midianites:<WH4080> have not<WH3808> I sent<WH7971> thee?

And he said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, Oh<WH994> my Lord,<WH136> wherewith<WH4100> shall I save<WH3467> <WH853> Israel?<WH3478> behold,<WH2009> my family<WH504> is poor<WH1800> in Manasseh,<WH4519> and I<WH595> am the least<WH6810> in my father's<WH1> house.<WH1004>
And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, Surely<WH3588> I will be<WH1961> with<WH5973> thee, and thou shalt smite<WH5221> <WH853> the Midianites<WH4080> as one<WH259> man.<WH376>

And he said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, If<WH518> now<WH4994> I have found<WH4672> grace<WH2580> in thy sight,<WH5869> then show<WH6213> me a sign<WH226> that thou<WH7945> <WH859> talkest<WH1696> with<WH5973> me.

Depart <WH4185> not<WH408> hence,<WH4480> <WH2088> I pray thee,<WH4994> until<WH5704> I come<WH935> unto<WH413> thee, and bring forth<WH3318> <WH853> my present,<WH4503> and set<WH5117> it before<WH6440> thee. And he said,<WH559> I<WH595> will tarry<WH3427> until<WH5704> thou come again.<WH7725>

And Gideon<WH1439> went in,<WH935> and made ready<WH6213> a kid,<WH1423> <WH5795> and unleavened cakes<WH4682> of an ephah<WH374> of flour:<WH7058> the flesh<WH1320> he put<WH7760> in a basket,<WH5536> and he put<WH7760> the broth<WH4839> in a pot,<WH6517> and brought it out<WH3318> unto<WH413> him under<WH413> <WH8478> the oak,<WH424> and presented<WH5066> it.

And the angel<WH4397> of God<WH430> said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, Take<WH3947> <WH853> the flesh<WH1320> and the unleavened cakes,<WH4682> and lay<WH5117> them upon<WH413> this<WH1975> rock,<WH5553> and pour out<WH8210> the broth.<WH4839> And he did<WH6213> so.<WH3651>

Then the angel<WH4397> of the LORD<WH3068> put forth<WH7971> <WH853> the end<WH7097> of the staff<WH4938> that<WH834> was in his hand,<WH3027> and touched<WH5060> the flesh<WH1320> and the unleavened cakes;<WH4682> and there rose up<WH5927> fire<WH784> out of<WH4480> the rock,<WH6697> and consumed<WH398> <WH853> the flesh<WH1320> and the unleavened cakes.<WH4682> Then the angel<WH4397> of the LORD<WH3068> departed<WH1980> out of his sight.<WH4480> <WH5869>

And when Gideon<WH1439> perceived<WH7200> that<WH3588> he<WH1931> was an angel<WH4397> of the LORD,<WH3068> Gideon<WH1439> said,<WH559> Alas,<WH162> O Lord<WH136> GOD!<WH3069> for<WH3588> because<WH5921> <WH3651> I have seen<WH7200> an angel<WH4397> of the LORD<WH3068> face<WH6440> to<WH413> face.<WH6440>
And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto him, Peace<WH7965> be unto thee; fear<WH3372> not:<WH408> thou shalt not<WH3808> die.<WH4191>

Then Gideon<WH1439> built<WH1129> an altar<WH4196> there<WH8033> unto the LORD,<WH3068> and called<WH7121> it Jehovah-shalom:<WH3073> unto<WH5704> this<WH2088> day<WH3117> it is yet<WH5750> in Ophrah<WH6084> of the Abi-ezrites.<WH33>

And it came to pass<WH1961> the same<WH1931> night,<WH3915> that the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto him, Take<WH3947> <WH853> thy father's<WH1> young bullock,<WH6499> <WH7794> even the second<WH8145> bullock<WH6499> of seven<WH7651> years<WH8141> old, and throw down<WH2040> <WH853> the altar<WH4196> of Baal<WH1168> that<WH834> thy father<WH1> hath, and cut down<WH3772> the grove<WH842> that<WH834> is by<WH5921> it:

And build<WH1129> an altar<WH4196> unto the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> upon<WH5921> the top<WH7218> of this<WH2088> rock,<WH4581> in the ordered place,<WH4634> and take<WH3947> <WH853> the second<WH8145> bullock,<WH6499> and offer<WH5927> a burnt sacrifice<WH5930> with the wood<WH6086> of the grove<WH842> which<WH834> thou shalt cut down.<WH3772>

Then Gideon<WH1439> took<WH3947> ten<WH6235> men<WH376> of his servants,<WH4480> <WH5650> and did<WH6213> as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> had said<WH1696> unto<WH413> him: and so it was,<WH1961> because<WH834> he feared<WH3372> <WH853> his father's<WH1> household,<WH1004> and the men<WH376> of the city,<WH5892> that he could not do<WH4480> <WH6213> it by day,<WH3119> that he did<WH6213> it by night.<WH3915>

And when the men<WH376> of the city<WH5892> arose early<WH7925> in the morning,<WH1242> behold,<WH2009> the altar<WH4196> of Baal<WH1168> was cast down,<WH5422> and the grove<WH842> was cut down<WH3772> that<WH834> was by<WH5921> it, and the second<WH8145> bullock<WH6499> was offered<WH5927> upon<WH5921> the altar<WH4196> that was built.<WH1129>

And they said<WH559> one<WH376> to<WH413> another,<WH7453> Who<WH4310> hath done<WH6213> this<WH2088> thing?<WH1697> And when they inquired<WH1875> and asked,<WH1245> they said,<WH559> Gideon<WH1439> the son<WH1121> of Joash<WH3101> hath done<WH6213> this<WH2088> thing.<WH1697>

Then the men<WH376> of the city<WH5892> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Joash,<WH3101> Bring out<WH3318> <WH853> thy son,<WH1121> that he may die:<WH4191> because<WH3588> he hath cast down<WH5422> <WH853> the altar<WH4196> of Baal,<WH1168> and because<WH3588> he hath cut down<WH3772> the grove<WH842> that<WH834> was by<WH5921> it.

And Joash<WH3101> said<WH559> unto all<WH3605> that<WH834> stood<WH5975> against<WH5921> him, Will ye<WH859> plead<WH7378> for Baal?<WH1168> will ye<WH859> save<WH3467> him? he that<WH834> will plead<WH7378> for him, let him be put to death<WH4191> whilst<WH5704> it is yet morning:<WH1242> if<WH518> he<WH1931> be a god,<WH430> let him plead<WH7378> for himself, because<WH3588> one hath cast down<WH5422> <WH853> his altar.<WH4196>

Therefore on that<WH1931> day<WH3117> he called<WH7121> him Jerubbaal,<WH3378> saying,<WH559> Let Baal<WH1168> plead<WH7378> against him, because<WH3588> he hath thrown down<WH5422> <WH853> his altar.<WH4196>

Then all<WH3605> the Midianites<WH4080> and the Amalekites<WH6003> and the children<WH1121> of the east<WH6924> were gathered<WH622> together,<WH3162> and went over,<WH5674> and pitched<WH2583> in the valley<WH6010> of Jezreel.<WH3157>
But the Spirit<WH7307> of the LORD<WH3068> came upon<WH3847> <WH853> Gideon,<WH1439> and he blew<WH8628> a trumpet;<WH7782> and Abi-ezer<WH44> was gathered<WH2199> after<WH310> him.

And he sent<WH7971> messengers<WH4397> throughout all<WH3605> Manasseh;<WH4519> who<WH1931> also<WH1571> was gathered<WH2199> after<WH310> him: and he sent<WH7971> messengers<WH4397> unto Asher,<WH836> and unto Zebulun,<WH2074> and unto Naphtali;<WH5321> and they came up<WH5927> to meet<WH7125> them.
And Gideon<WH1439> said<WH559> unto<WH413> God,<WH430> If<WH518> thou<WH3426> wilt save<WH3467> <WH853> Israel<WH3478> by mine hand,<WH3027> as<WH834> thou hast said,<WH1696>

Behold, <WH2009> I<WH595> will put<WH3322> <WH853> a fleece<WH1492> of wool<WH6785> in the floor;<WH1637> and if<WH518> the dew<WH2919> be<WH1961> on<WH5921> the fleece<WH1492> only,<WH905> and it be dry<WH2721> upon<WH5921> all<WH3605> the earth<WH776> beside, then shall I know<WH3045> that<WH3588> thou wilt save<WH3467> <WH853> Israel<WH3478> by mine hand,<WH3027> as<WH834> thou hast said.<WH1696>

And it was<WH1961> so:<WH3651> for he rose up early<WH7925> on the morrow,<WH4480> <WH4283> and thrust<WH2115> <WH853> the fleece<WH1492> together,<WH2115> and wrung<WH4680> the dew<WH2919> out of<WH4480> the fleece,<WH1492> a bowl<WH5602> full<WH4392> of water.<WH4325>

And Gideon<WH1439> said<WH559> unto<WH413> God,<WH430> Let not<WH408> thine anger<WH639> be hot<WH2734> against me and I will speak<WH1696> but<WH389> this once:<WH6471> let me prove,<WH5254> I pray thee,<WH4994> but<WH7535> this once<WH6471> with the fleece;<WH1492> let it now<WH4994> be<WH1961> dry<WH2721> only<WH905> upon<WH413> the fleece,<WH1492> and upon<WH5921> all<WH3605> the ground<WH776> let there be<WH1961> dew.<WH2919>

And God<WH430> did<WH6213> so<WH3651> that<WH1931> night:<WH3915> for it was<WH1961> dry<WH2721> upon<WH413> the fleece<WH1492> only,<WH905> and there was<WH1961> dew<WH2919> on<WH5921> all<WH3605> the ground.<WH776>
